bill_title: Honoring the players and coaches of the 2002 Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the players and coaches of the 2002 Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team. WHEREAS, the Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team won the 2002 South Dakota State 15-16 Teener Baseball Tournament; and WHEREAS, players Josh Brown, Blake Olson, Adam Fritz, Lee Gelderman, Zach Zephier, and Bobby Clark be applauded for their great offensive playing; and WHEREAS, pitchers Jarad Wagner and Kenny Redenius be commended for their excellent pitching performances and defensive playing; and WHEREAS, Bret Severtson, Kyle Sanderson, Drew Weber, Beau Bunkers, Cody Amdahl, and Tanner Harris be commended for their contributions to a memorable season; and WHEREAS, Coaches Tom Hansen and Gary Christensen be congratulated for their guidance in leading the team to the championship: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2002 Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team be recognized for their 2002 championship season.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the players and coaches of the 2002 Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team. WHEREAS, the Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team won the 2002 South Dakota State 15- 16 Teener Baseball Tournament; and WHEREAS, players Josh Brown, Blake Olson, Adam Fritz, Lee Gelderman, Zach Zephier, and Bobby Clark be applauded for their great offensive playing; and WHEREAS, pitchers Jarad Wagner and Kenny Redenius be commended for their excellent pitching performances and defensive playing; and WHEREAS, Bret Severtson, Kyle Sanderson, Drew Weber, Beau Bunkers, Cody Amdahl, and Tanner Harris be commended for their contributions to a memorable season; and WHEREAS, Coaches Tom Hansen and Gary Christensen be congratulated for their guidance in leading the team to the championship: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2002 Flandreau 15-16 Teener Baseball Team be recognized for their 2002 championship season.
